A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Some star wars fans may not be happy that it wasn't the film they wanted\, but both my fiance and I are massive fans of star wars\, and we loved this film. Remember that many of these negative reviews are from people who are still annoyed that this wasn't the Thrawn Trillogy they'd always wanted\, and most movie-goers won't even know who that is. Watch the film and let yourself form your own opinions. Don't let hard-liners from the old guard tell you what to think.
